The Bamboo that Bends is Stronger than the Oak that Resists

Karoun Charkoudian, Relaxation Specialist and owner of the Karoun Yoga Studio in Downtown Springfield, has found that integrating the concept of flow and flexibility into her business model (not just her yoga classes!) has helped tremendously in the growth and prosperity of her business.  She will share her experience, as well as tips on how you can more easily "go with the flow" in your business to find growth with greater ease.


Karoun received her Bachelor of Arts at The Johns Hopkins University and her Master of Science at the University of Wisconsin, both in Geological Sciences.  She was recruited out of graduate school to work in the petroleum industry in Houston.   In 2008, after 5 years in the corporate world, she left to follow her passion of yoga.
Karoun has studied intensely with Qi Gong masters from Korea, and has completed yoga teacher trainings with YogaFit in Hatha and Vinyasa Flow yoga, as well as with Shiva Rea, the top name in Vinyasa Flow Yoga today.  She opened her studio in April 2009, has been teaching yoga for almost 3 years and practicing for 7 years.  She seeks to share the relaxation, ease, energy, and focus that she experiences on a daily basis through yoga.


Through yoga, Karoun has successfully worked with people to alleviate anxiety, release arthritic pain, find greater mobility, and to feel a greater sense of relaxation and peace.  She's even helped a runner to gain a larger stride, and a basketball player to find quicker reaction time on the court.  In her yoga classes people arrive jarred from their day, and leave in a completely different space: calm, relaxed, and peaceful.
In addition to open public classes (including two free classes per week) -- the studio offers private group classes to organizations, families, and friends, as well as private classes to individuals.  In her seminars, Karoun teaches very simple stress relief techniques to local colleges, offices, organizations, and schools, making relaxation accessible to everyone.
